Suite.Title: Facebook

Text.Title: Page Id
Text.HelpText: The feed of posts (including status updates) and links published by this page, or by others on this page.

Text.Title: Page Id
Text.HelpText: The feed of posts including status updates and links published to this group.

Text.Title: Event Id
Text.HelpText: The feed of posts including status updates and links published to this Event's wall.

Text.Title: Query
Text.HelpText: Search for a person (if they allow their name to be searched for).

RestConnector.Title: Avatars
RestConnector.HelpText: Avatar Link for Page or User

RestConnector.Title: Unknown Id Type
RestConnector.HelpText: Determines the type from an unknown Id

RestConnector.Title: Unknown Id Type Batch
RestConnector.HelpText: Determines the type from unknown Ids
